inclusion.criterion: Patients admitted to the Jewish General Hospital for elective coronary artery bypass grafting from January 2021 will be included in the study.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The study population will include 40 patients that will be randomly assigned to one of two treatment groups according to the venous cannulation technique used during surgery.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Second or third degree heart block
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of CAD, atrial fibrillation, and previous cardiac surgery, which may make them ineligible for the study.
